<p className={styles.revertMarginTop}>
  Called during the initialization of the satellite. This hook is invoked when
  the satellite is first deployed and can be used to set up initial
  configurations or resources.
</p>

```rust
#[on_init]
fn on_init() -> Result<(), String> {
    // Custom logic for initialization
    Ok(())
}
```

Unlike datastore or storage hooks, `on_init` cannot be scoped to specific collections or assets, as it is meant to handle global initialization logic.

This feature is not enabled by default. To use it, youâ€™ll need to opt in by updating your `Cargo.toml` file.

```toml
[dependencies]
junobuild-satellite = { version = "*", features = ["default", "on_init"] }
```
